image_2.description: The Lincoln Memorial is a monument in Washington, characterized by large columns and a view towards the National Mall, where visitors found shade during the heat wave.

image_5.description: Meryl Streep is a fine actress, known for her use of eyewear in her performances. An older woman with short, white hair styled in an elegant updo, she is wearing a black top and holding the frame of her glasses with her right hand, which has a large green ring on one finger. Her expression is serious and contemplative.
